title: Place a hyperlink in email
content:
Since Thunderbird changed recently, I have had a problem placing a hyperlink in an email. When writing an email, and then click on Insert. The drop down list has an item "Link". The process that I am used to is that I hit "Link" and a dialog box appears giving me a field to enter the url and other details. Since the thunderbird changes, I do not see that dialog box, but I do see a line at the very extreme right of the screen as if Thunderbird has placed the dialog box off the screen. When this happens, any attempt to take any action just gives rise to a "bell" sound. The only way that I can find is <Ctrl><Alt><Delete> and then close Thunderbird at the Task manager. I am using Windows 7.

Richard Schurmann
